sense.def:
To dissolve a solid substance
pomeni mešati trdno snov s tekočino, dokler se ne razkroji.

seg.quote: Dissolve the sugar in the water.
Stir over a low heat until the sugar has dissolved.

sense.def:
To dissolve an organization or legal relationship
pomeni uradno prekiniti neko organizacijo ali zakonski odnos;

seg.quote: They wish to dissolve their union with the United States.

sense.def:
To dissolve into tears or laughter
pomeni začeti jokati ali se smejati, ker se ne moremo obvladati;
